name: Seeing Green Hoodie
description: Tag a friend so they have to open their phone and look at all this pickle swag, for every reason you can possibly think of. Pickle Finance is a Yield Aggregator. It aggregates and compounds yield from other protocols. It saves you time and money as compared to doing it yourself. This fashion isnâ€™t just ordinary fashion. It onboards you into an entire world of NFTs, Decentralized Finance, Crypto and Web3. Every fashion piece is a unique NFT that can also earn you yield in $MONA token and other crypto. We are melting the centralized exploitative crown to weave the fabric of a generative ecosystem.

attributes.value: Fashion x DeFi, Wear to DeFi
